desc.cn: 洁尔佩塔是兼具法术和物理能力的辅助干员。她可以在触发法术异常后快速造成击飞，并且施放终结技后可以对大范围内的敌人施加法术脆弱效果。
desc.en: Gilberta is a supporter with both Arts and Physical abilities. She can quickly Lift enemies after triggering Arts Reactions. Once cast, her ultimate also applies Arts Susceptibility to enemies within a large area.

desc.cn: 莱万汀是一名拥有强大群体输出能力的突击干员。她可以通过重击吸收附近敌人的灼热附着，触发强力战技和连携技，并使用终结技横扫大量敌人。
desc.en: Laevatain is a striker with outstanding mass DMG skills. Her Final Strikes can absorb Heat Inflictions from nearby enemies to trigger powerful battle skills and combo skills. She can also use her ultimate to carve and burn her way through mobs of enemies.

desc.cn: 伊冯是一名通过暴击造成大量输出的干员。施放终结技后，能获得强力的单体输出能力。
desc.en: Yvonne is a DMG dealer who leverages her critical hits. Her ultimate makes her a powerful single-target DMG dealer.
